name: COSmart
0:
”Alexa, ask c. o. smart”
”Alexa, start c. o. smart and turn on the room”
”Alexa, start c. o. smart and turn off the room”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. o. smart
des:
CO Smart, a skill. It can control ChampOn's device, light with wireless WiFi. To use your Amazon Echo with your CO Smart, make sure you have the latest Alexa app on your device, you have your CO Smart, and activate the CO Smart Skill. This will require your ChampOn app account username and password to authorize Alexa to access your devices.

To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your ChampOn account.
When using the skill. you need to specify by name which device to use. You can set the devices's name in ChampOn app which controls your devices. You can find the exact ChampOn app name in your product user manual.

Your CO Smart now talk directly to the Amazon Echo through the Alexa. You can control your CO Smart with simple statements like:

Alexa, Turn on the room
Alexa, Turn off the room
Alexa, Set room to blue
Alexa, Turn on/off the <device' name>

Remarks: When you say Alexa to wake up Alexa and say CO Smart to enter skill, you will enter the session mode, you don't have to wake up Alexa and get into this skill.

For example: Alexa, c. o. smart, turn on the room, turn off the room, bye.

If you have any questions, please visit ChampOn website or email sales@champontech.com for further assistance.
